MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the L11 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Middleway and surrounding streets.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:58PM.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site needed to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 11:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:03PM on 14th February 2021.
